Exception in thread "main" java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException: Index: 0, Size: 0
	at java/util/ArrayList.RangeCheck(ArrayList.java:528)
	at java/util/ArrayList.get(ArrayList.java:340)
	at org/eclipse/stellation/util/StringList.get(StringList.java:283)

Created an attachment (id=3371)
Patch that fixes the bug

This bug was an omission of the code to test that necessary
parameters were supplied to the command. If the parameters were
not supplied, then it would index off the end of the parameter array.

The fix checks for necessary parameters, and generates error messages
if they were not supplied.

This patch looks fine.

Regards

Jonathan
